data.message: He's representing a city decimated by Democrats and talking shit on a republican. Get the fuck out of here with that bullshit.

replies.message: Fuck ur a sheep
Can you rap better?
Bah bah bitch! Back it up. Easy to call names but you know I'm right.
Never said his rap skills suck or that I'm better. I'm saying what he's rapping about is bs.
Trump isn't a Republican. He gives a shit about 1 person and 1 person only.
I'm a fan of Eminem, but he's wrong in this area and should stick to what he knows.
This would be what Mike is referring to.
This isn't anything new, need I remind you? "Stomp, push shove, mush; fuck Bush!"
Good point. Still makes my point valid though.
Yeah i guess the auto industry going overseas didnt have anything to do with it.
And why did it go overseas?
Cause it puts profit over all else. Just like Trump and his Asian factories.
Democratic government regulation. Over regulation actually. Democratics raising taxes, not upholding immigration laws. It's not that hard to understand.
So you're mad someone is trying to get rich? Isn't that what em is doing too? Y'all are crazy.
What do the immigration laws have to do with the Auto industry moving out of the US exactly?

No because of the shitty Democrats ran that city to the ground. Kept raising takes so the people with money left. Then the schools had no money so everyone else left that could. I'm born and raised in Detroit I live the city. And the people. But it is shitty

Yea Trump only cares about himself, that's why he took a break from his billion dollar business to reject 400k a year and try and get the us back in line so people can make money and the economy thrive. Because he only cares about himself. If he did he would have stayed right where he was. Where he didn't have one of the most stressful jobs in the world. Fucking idiot.
Same like Trump should of stayed  on TV!!!!
I don't think it's about Republicans or Democrats pal. I reckon it's about one cunt that is squeezing your nation until it pops...
Jody Thrift allowing illegal immigrants into this country effects everyone in every way. For job availability, taxes, crime, education, etc.
Run behind the Republican shadow you piece of shit. Cause like him I don't need no politician representing me.
Ross Macfadzean hillary lost.
Not mad that someone is trying to get rich. It's fine to put profit over patriotism, just isn't fine to pretend that's not what you're doing.
Ross Macfadzean coming from a fucked country yourself, not sure how you have room to speak on our policies.

Once these trump enthusiasts realize that the fuckery this guy is pulling in office is going to affect them as well as minorities, MAYBE the light will go off. Until then, they’ll be in the utter darkness
